r.d: This class provides handling of tar files in PHP. It supports creating, listing, extracting and adding to tar files. Gzip support is available if PHP has the zlib extension built-in or loaded. Bz2 compression is also supported with the bz2 extension loaded.
r.n: * Fix Bug #16963: extractList can't extract zipped files from big tar [mrook] * Implement Feature #4013: Ignoring files and directories on creating an archive. [mrook]
